main event: A civilian observed a bright light in the sky near Osceola, Arkansas on March 10, 1967.
interesting points: The object was observed for 10 minutes,The light was stationary before moving towards the southeast,The object was brighter than a bright star in the sky,There were no sounds or exhaust associated with the object,It was concluded that the object could have been a KC-135 aircraft due to its flood lights.
sighted object: a bright light on a pole
witness description: The observer sounded shocked but awed by the sighting and appeared concerned about other reported sightings in the area.
